sources.title: No Chance | Full Action Comedy Movie 2020 | 80s Style!
sources.description:
***This film is under license from ITN Distribution. All rights reserved.***

No Chance - When a group of international criminals from his past kidnap his daughter, the world's greatest commando sets out for revenge in this action-packed parody of everything you loved about the 80's.

2020
Stars: John Mantrixx, Jason Chilton, Kacey Samiee
